promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a gigantic mythical lynx normal-type wearing ancient bracers. It can be found in grassland-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or normal. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Ferelynx, a gigantic mythical lynx normal-type pokemon. It can be found in grassland-like environments It has the following abilities: hyper-voice. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word lynx or normal or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, lynx-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pastel colors
generatedDescription: Ferelynx, a gentle giant that roams grassy plains. Its powerful voice pierces the air, a prideful call of its majestic home.
